attributes.action: Give the Chuckle Brothers a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chuckle Brothers (Paul & Barry Elliot) are prominent figures in British children's television, stage and comedy. The comedy of the Chuckle Brothers derives from slapstick, and other visual gags. The Chuckle Brothers' catchphrase : "To me, to you." is legendary.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
